hands.name: High Card
hands.rule: The player with the highest card wins.

hands.name: One Pair
hands.rule: The player with one pair of cards with the same value wins.

hands.name: Two Pairs
hands.rule: The player with two pairs of cards with the same value wins.

hands.name: Three of a Kind
hands.rule: The player with three cards of the same value wins.

hands.name: Straight
hands.rule: The player with a sequence of five cards in a row wins.

hands.name: Flush
hands.rule: The player with five cards of the same suit wins.

hands.name: Full House
hands.rule: The player with three of a kind and a pair wins.

hands.name: Four of a Kind
hands.rule: The player with four cards of the same value wins.

hands.name: Straight Flush
hands.rule: The player with a sequence of five cards in a row, all of the same suit, wins.

hands.name: Royal Flush
hands.rule: The player with a straight flush consisting of the Ace, King, Queen, Jack and Ten wins.

phases.name: Dealing
phases.rule: The dealer deals five cards to each player. The remaining deck is set aside.

phases.name: Betting
phases.rule: Each player may choose to bet, call or fold. This continues until all players have called or the pot has been won.

phases.name: Showdown
phases.rule: The remaining players reveal their hands. The hand with the highest ranking wins the pot.
